description:
The AWS Lambda Tools for Powershell allows PowerShell developers to publish PowerShell scripts with their dependent modules and have the scripts be invoked by Lambda.

_**NOTE: This module requires PowerShell Core.**_

**NOTE**: This is an automatically updated package. If you find it is out of date by more than a week, please contact the maintainer(s) and let them know the package is no longer updating correctly.
displayName: AWS Lambda for PowerShell Core (PowerShell Module)
summary: The AWS Lambda Tools for Powershell allows PowerShell developers to publish PowerShell scripts with their dependent modules and have the scripts be invoked by Lambda.
author: Amazon.com Inc
